original_text: The aim of this note is nothing more than to bring both approaches on equal footing and to relax the assumptions under which the results of [11,13] have been derived using the first approach. More concretely, we generalize the one-loop partition functions, as derived in [11,13] for levels being odd, to the case of even levels. Moreover, on the level of partition functions we implement additional dressings of the world-sheet parity symmetry and identify them with the dressings introduced in [12] in the crosscap state approach. As expected, all the physical information can be read off entirely from the various amplitudes. We will end up with a collection of very explicit and general one-loop partition functions and tadpole cancellation conditions covering simple current extensions of all 168 Gepner models with additional dressings of the parity symmetry. In fact providing a compact collection of the main relevant formulas for constructing supersymmetric Gepner model orientifolds was one of the motivations for writing this Letter. We hope that these expressions turn out to be useful for a systematic search for Standard-like models respectively for providing a statistical ensemble in the spirit of [29].
original_translation: El objetivo de esta nota no es más que igualar ambos enfoques y relajar las suposiciones bajo las cuales se derivaron los resultados de [11,13] utilizando el primer enfoque. Más concretamente, generalizamos las funciones de partición de un bucle, como se derivó en [11,13] para niveles impares, al caso de niveles pares. Además, en el nivel de las funciones de partición implementamos vestimentas adicionales de la simetría de paridad de la hoja del mundo y las identificamos con las vestimentas introducidas en [12] en el enfoque del estado de la tapa cruzada. Como era de esperar, toda la información física se puede extraer por completo de las diversas amplitudes. Terminaremos con una colección de funciones de partición de un bucle muy explícitas y generales y condiciones de cancelación de renacuajos que cubren extensiones de corriente simple de los 168 modelos de Gepner con vestimentas adicionales de la simetría de paridad. De hecho, proporcionar una colección compacta de las fórmulas relevantes principales para construir orientifolds de modelos de Gepner supersimétricos fue una de las motivaciones para escribir esta carta. Esperamos que estas expresiones resulten útiles para una búsqueda sistemática de modelos similares al Estándar respectivamente para proporcionar un conjunto estadístico en el espíritu de [29].

More concretely, we generalize the one-loop partition functions, as derived in [11,13] for levels being odd, to the case of even levels.

Moreover, on the level of partition functions we implement additional dressings of the world-sheet parity symmetry and identify them with the dressings introduced in [12] in the crosscap state approach.
As expected, all the physical information can be read off entirely from the various amplitudes.

We will end up with a collection of very explicit and general one-loop partition functions and tadpole cancellation conditions covering simple current extensions of all 168 Gepner models with additional dressings of the parity symmetry.
In fact providing a compact collection of the main relevant formulas for constructing supersymmetric Gepner model orientifolds was one of the motivations for writing this Letter.
We hope that these expressions turn out to be useful for a systematic search for Standard-like models respectively for providing a statistical ensemble in the spirit of [29].

muy explícitas y generales y condiciones de cancelación de renacuajos que cubren extensiones de corriente simple de los 168 modelos de Gepner con vestimentas adicionales de la simetría de paridad. Esperamos que estas expresiones resulten útiles para una búsqueda sistemática de modelos similares al Estándar respectivamente para proporcionar un conjunto estadístico en el espíritu de [29].

original_annotated_sentences: The aim of this note is nothing more than to bring both approaches on equal footing and to relax the assumptions under which the results of [11,13] have been derived using the first approach.
More concretely, we generalize the one-loop partition functions, as derived in [11,13] for levels being odd, to the case of even levels.

Moreover, on the level of partition functions we implement additional dressings of the world-sheet
parity symmetry
and identify them with the dressings introduced in [12] in the crosscap state approach.
As expected, all the physical information can be read off entirely from the various amplitudes.

We will end up with a collection of very explicit and general one-loop partition functions and tadpole cancellation conditions covering simple current extensions of all 168 Gepner models with additional dressings of the
parity symmetry
.
In fact providing a compact collection of the main relevant formulas for constructing supersymmetric Gepner model orientifolds was one of the motivations for writing this Letter.
We hope that these expressions turn out to be useful for a systematic search for Standard-like models respectively for providing a statistical ensemble in the spirit of [29].

original_annotated_sentences: The aim of this note is nothing more than to bring both approaches on equal footing and to relax the assumptions under which the results of [11,13] have been derived using the first approach.
More concretely, we generalize the one-loop partition functions, as derived in [11,13] for levels being odd, to the case of even levels.

Moreover, on the level of partition functions we implement additional dressings of the world-sheet parity symmetry and identify them with the dressings introduced in [12] in the crosscap state approach.
As expected, all the physical information can be read off entirely from the various amplitudes.

We will end up with a collection of very explicit and general one-loop partition functions and tadpole cancellation conditions covering simple current extensions of all 168 Gepner models with additional dressings of the parity symmetry.
In fact providing a compact collection of the main relevant formulas for constructing supersymmetric Gepner model orientifolds was one of the motivations for writing this Letter.

We hope that these expressions turn out to be useful for a
systematic search for Standard-like models
respectively for providing a statistical ensemble in the spirit of [29].

Más concretamente, generalizamos las funciones de partición de un bucle, como se derivó en [11,13] para niveles impares, al caso de niveles pares. Además, en el nivel de las funciones de partición implementamos vestimentas adicionales de la simetría de paridad de la hoja del mundo y las identificamos con las vestimentas introducidas en [12] en el enfoque del estado de la tapa cruzada. Como era de esperar, toda la información física se puede extraer por completo de las diversas amplitudes. Terminaremos con una colección de funciones de partición de un bucle muy explícitas y generales y condiciones de cancelación de renacuajos que cubren extensiones de corriente simple de los 168 modelos de Gepner con vestimentas adicionales de la simetría de paridad. De hecho, proporcionar una colección compacta de las fórmulas relevantes principales para construir orientifolds de modelos de Gepner supersimétricos fue una de las motivaciones para escribir esta carta. Esperamos que estas expresiones resulten útiles para una
búsqueda sistemática de modelos similares al Estándar
respectivamente para proporcionar un conjunto estadístico en el espíritu de [29].
